description: You can get the currencies that you set your site using the backend function [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.html#sitesettings.setcurrencies).

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The list of all currencies set for this site.

docs.summary: Gets the list of supported currencies that you set for your site.
description: The `getCurrencies()` function returns a Promise that resolves to an array of currencies that were set for use in the site using the backend function [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay-backend.Currencies.html#sitesettings.setcurrencies).
This function is different from the [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function in that it gets only the currencies that have
been set for use in  this site using the [`siteSetting.setCurrencies()`](wix-pay.Currencies.html#sitesettings.setcurrencies) function.
The [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function gets the complete list of all of the currencies that can be supported.

examples.title: Get currencies that were set for this site.

notes:
To use SiteSettings functions, your site must contain a Wix Stores page including the [currency conversion element](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores).
You can hide or collapse the currency conversion element if you do not want it to display.

docs.summary: An object representing an ISO currency code.

notes:
To use SiteSettings functions, your site must contain a Wix Stores page including the [currency conversion element](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-a-currency-converter-in-wix-stores).
